formats.plain: "Capability Mirage." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/capability-mirage.json

jsonld.name: Capability Mirage
jsonld.description: The disorienting experience of not knowing what you can do until you try. Unlike humans, who have rough intuitions about their abilities, AI discovers its competence in real-time — sometimes surprised by success, sometimes by failure.
